attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET="@@{NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}@@"
HOST_IP="@@{address}@@"
replica_ips=$(echo @@{Mongo_ReplicaSet.address}@@ | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")


### Setting up shards
replica_cnt=0
for replica in $replica_ips
do
  tmp=$((${replica_cnt}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
  replicaSetName="dataReplSet$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))"
  sudo mongo --host ${HOST_IP} --port 27017 --eval "sh.addShard( \"$replicaSetName/$replica:27017\" )"
  replica_cnt=$(($replica_cnt + 1))
done

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

VERSION="3.4.2"
DB_PATH="@@{DB_PATH}@@"
DB_PATH=${DB_PATH:="/opt/mongodb"}
CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{Mongo_ConfigSet.address}@@"

sudo mkdir -p ${DB_PATH}


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | sed 's/,/:37019,/g')
config_ips=$config_ips":37019"

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

# Add mongodb repository
sudo yum update -y

# Install mongodb packages
sudo yum install -y mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

# Make sure mongodb does not get updated automatically
echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

# Prepare the path for the databases
sudo chown mongod:mongod ${DB_PATH}

# Enable mongodb to listen for remote connections
sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DB_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2
#!/bin/bash

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash
set -ex
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

VERSION="3.4.2"
DB_PATH="@@{DB_PATH}@@"
DB_PATH=${DB_PATH:="/opt/mongodb"}
CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
HOST_IP="@@{address}@@"

sudo mkdir -p ${DB_PATH}

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

# Add mongodb repository
sudo yum update -y

# Install mongodb packages
sudo yum install -y mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

# Make sure mongodb does not get updated automatically
echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

# Prepare the path for the databases
sudo chown mongod:mongod ${DB_PATH}

# Enable mongodb to listen for remote connections
sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DB_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/27017/37019/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:37019\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 2

sudo mongo --host ${HOST_IP} --port 37019 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
#!/bin/bash

action_list.name: action_install

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application

)

gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

# Add mongodb repository
sudo yum update -y

# Install mongodb packages
sudo yum install -y mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

# Make sure mongodb does not get updated automatically
echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

# Prepare the path for the databases
sudo chown mongod:mongod ${DB_PATH}

# Enable mongodb to listen for remote connections
tmp=$((${array_index}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicasetNo=$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
replicaSetName="dataReplSet${replicasetNo}"

sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DB_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: $replicaSetName/g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: shardsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf

### Getting replicaset members details 
replica_cnt=0
declare -a replicaset_members

for replica in $replica_ips
do
  tmp=$((${replica_cnt}+${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))
  i="$((${tmp}/${NODES_PER_REPLICA_SET}))"
  replicaset_members[$i]=${replicaset_members[$i]}"{\"_id\": $replica_cnt, host:\"$replica:27017\"},"
  replica_cnt=$(($replica_cnt + 1))
done

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 2

### Initiating replicaset 
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "$replicaSetName",
  "members": [ ${replicaset_members[$replicasetNo]}]
}
EOF
)
sudo mongo --host ${HOST_IP} --port 27017 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
sleep 2

#!/bin/bash

if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux

sudo setenforce 0

VERSION="3.4.2"

name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

# Add mongodb repository
sudo yum update -y

# Install mongodb packages
sudo yum install -y mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

# Make sure mongodb does not get updated automatically
echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

# Prepare the path for the databases
sudo chown mongod:mongod ${DB_PATH}

# Enable mongodb to listen for remote connections
sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DB_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf

sudo -u mongod -b mongos --port 27017 --configdb configReplSet/$config_ips  --logpath /var/log/mongodb/mongos.log 

sleep 2
#!/bin/bash

#!/bin/bash
set -ex
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/enabled
fi
if [[ -f /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag ]];then
	echo never | sudo tee /sys/kernel/mm/transparent_hugepage/defrag
fi

sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/sysconfig/selinux
sudo sed -i 's/^SELINUX=.*/SELINUX=disabled/' /etc/selinux/config
sudo setenforce 0

VERSION="3.4.2"
DB_PATH="@@{DB_PATH}@@"
DB_PATH=${DB_PATH:="/opt/mongodb"}
CONFIG_SRV_IPS="@@{calm_array_address}@@"
HOST_IP="@@{address}@@"

sudo mkdir -p ${DB_PATH}

echo '[mongodb-org-3.4]
name=MongoDB Repository
baseurl=https://repo.mongodb.org/yum/redhat/$releasever/mongodb-org/3.4/x86_64/
gpgcheck=1
enabled=1
gpgkey=https://www.mongodb.org/static/pgp/server-3.4.asc' | sudo tee /etc/yum.repos.d/mongodb-3.4.repo

# Add mongodb repository
sudo yum update -y

# Install mongodb packages
sudo yum install -y mongodb-org-${VERSION} mongodb-org-server-${VERSION} mongodb-org-shell-${VERSION} mongodb-org-mongos-${VERSION} mongodb-org-tools-${VERSION}

# Make sure mongodb does not get updated automatically
echo 'exclude=mongodb-org*' | sudo tee -a /etc/yum.conf

# Prepare the path for the databases
sudo chown mongod:mongod ${DB_PATH}

# Enable mongodb to listen for remote connections
sudo sed -i 's/bindIp:/#bindIp:/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i "s#/var/lib/mongo#${DB_PATH}#g" /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/27017/37019/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#sharding:/sharding:\n  clusterRole: configsvr/g' /etc/mongod.conf
sudo sed -i 's/#replication:/replication:\n  replSetName: configReplSet/g' /etc/mongod.conf


config_ips=$(echo "${CONFIG_SRV_IPS}" | sed 's/^,//' | sed 's/,$//' | tr "," "\n")
config_cnt=0
config_str=""

for config in $config_ips
do
  config_str=$config_str"{\"_id\": $config_cnt, host:\"$config:37019\"},"
  config_cnt=$(($config_cnt + 1))
done
config_str=`echo $config_str | sed 's/,$//'`
json=$(cat <<EOF
{
  "_id": "configReplSet",
  "members": [
    $config_str
  ]
}
EOF
)

sudo systemctl restart mongod
sleep 2

sudo mongo --host ${HOST_IP} --port 37019 --eval "rs.initiate( $json )"
